Discount Calculator

Calculate discounts, savings, and final prices

Discount Amount$0.00
Final Price$0.00
You Save0.00%
How It's Calculated

Discount Amount = Original Price × (Discount % ÷ 100)

Final Price = Original Price - Discount Amount

Savings % = (Discount Amount ÷ Original Price) × 100
